statements: DELETE FROM virtual_events WHERE event_type = 'webinar' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM virtual_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Conference%';
DELETE FROM Workshop WHERE workshop_name = 'Coding Basics';
DELETE FROM Workshop WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Workshop WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Event WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND event_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM workshops WHERE workshop_instructor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_phone IS NULL;
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND event_id = 1;
DELETE FROM workshop_attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND workshop_id = 1;
